description: men and women seated at right and standing in distance at center--some looking through binoculars--looking over water at left and center; horizontal image
inscription:
Signature, Edition and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [153024]
provenance: [Arsène Bonafous-Murat, Paris, until 1990; sold in June for Fr PTOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1990-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in black ink: [A Lepère 3/35.]; bottom right, in the print: [A. LEPERE]
title: Valley of the Solle, Fontainebleau Forest
